TopicTitle: [1.12.X] Tantares - Stockalike Soyuz and MIR [16.1][28.05.2024][{Proton Revamp]

Articles.Content:
I must admit, the effect on that Vostok Stage engine is really gorgeous! May we have the same on other Tavio engines? That blue-violet is nice too, but it is suitable only on UDMH engines as on Proton, but on Kerosene R-7 it looks not so good.

Edited January 3, 2015 by Niemand303
I would love to see a fregat upper stage come out of this mod. That, and more Soviet probes.
I second that

I would love to see a fregat upper stage come out of this mod. That, and more Soviet probes.

I'd vote for Block-D instead of Fregat, but still would be nice.

I'm not sure, Tantares is already on CKAN.

This thing is interesting too though, thanks, I'll take a look

For development, I'm using my trusty SVN server - no risk of losing everything.

AVC doesn't host anything but the version file. You update it when you make a new version, and folks with AVC installed see this when KSP loads:

Antenna Farm is a pack I made just for myself to use RemoteTech antennas like regular antennas without RemoteTech installed. I made the versioning just to see how AVC worked.

Edited January 3, 2015 by tg626

I would love to see a fregat upper stage come out of this mod. That, and more Soviet probes.
I'd vote for Block-D instead of Fregat, but still would be nice.

If only one get's picked, I go for the Blok-D

Cheers, flamerboy67664

And that's a good looking ship but its not the Botany Bay ;-)

http://vignette2.wikia.nocookie.net/memoryalpha/images/5/5a/SS_Botany_Bay,_remastered.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20130709090332&path-prefix=en

Oh I know that, I said it was inspired, not a direct copy
Excuse me mein Beale, Do you have any plans for Tantares Merchandise? Such as T-Shirts und Beale Plushes?
Ah yes, I'd love to have a Beale loaf staring at me while I sleep.
We All Would Like An Adorable Little Sentient Loaf Staring at us while we Sleep. But, As With All Plushes somebody is going to end up adding a strategically placed hole in it. *Shudder*
I would Like Some Sentient Bread.

We All Would Like An Adorable Little Sentient Loaf Staring at us while we Sleep. But, As With All Plushes somebody is going to end up adding a strategically placed hole in it. *Shudder*

That's for someone who loves the mod TOO much.

I'll pretend the latter half of page 326 does not exist

I must admit, the effect on that Vostok Stage engine is really gorgeous! May we have the same on other Tavio engines? That blue-violet is nice too, but it is suitable only on UDMH engines as on Proton, but on Kerosene R-7 it looks not so good.

http://cdn3.img22.ria.ru/images/60617/24/606172494.jpg

I agree with this, current choice is due to no exhaust_red, only exhaust_red_small is available, so I'd need to make my own Kerosene effect.

Somewhat related, you are a good person to ask: The Proton is all unsymmetrical dimethylhydrazine and N Tetroxide mix for fuel?

What colour does that burn, gah...

Somewhat related, you are a good person to ask: The Proton is all unsymmetrical dimethylhydrazine and N Tetroxide mix for fuel?

Yeah, on all stages. It's one of the reason TKS never flew manned: it's more toxic than WWI poisons.

You are right, it's first triple rendez-vous and what is most important - the first welding in space. Which allowed many awesome things as repair in space (Salyut and Mir) and other complicated assembly stuff.

Yeah, in my dreams it would be something with special L2/L3 placement for N-1/L3 Lunar project, a specialy shaped TKS fairing and a generic "Proton payload" fairing which could be hiding Salyut/Mir/ISS parts. But since I have a hard time making making even Soyuz fairings it may stay in my dreams.

It looks nice! Will you make other fairings for the 3rd stage engine or the engines will be untouched?

Nice!!!

No more tipping over during my gravity turn!!

Can you give a release date???

*puppy eyes* please?

Haha thanks!

It's hard to say, a part a day? sometimes...

Next week maybe?

You are right, it's first triple rendez-vous and what is most important - the first welding in space. Which allowed many awesome things as repair in space (Salyut and Mir) and other complicated assembly stuff.

It looks nice! Will you make other fairings for the 3rd stage engine or the engines will be untouched?

Even more interesting! Thanks for the info.

Thanks! Engines, will be completely re-done, the current ones are very unlike the real deal:

But, for sizing, the old ones are vaguely the same dimensions, so shouldn't change to much.

So, yeah the third stage will have the correct "closed" fairings.

The RD-0210 has a wider bell nozzle than what the current "ALV Engine" has.

Another small part.

Maybe it is a little dark...
